_source.text: 1/2 cup unsweetened grated/shredded coconut 1/4 Pecan meal (i know almond meal is better, but pecan meal is CHEAPER) 1/4 milled flax seeds Water to desired consistency Splash of unsweetened Almond milk Small handful blueberries I sweeten with pure stevia extract powder, a little raw honey works too.
